snippet: TaShawn Thomas scored 23 points, including two free throws with nine seconds left, and blocked a late layup by Shabazz Napier as host Houston defeated No. 17 Connecticut.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; University of Houston defeats University of Connecticut, 75-71, in American Athletic Conference opener for both teams; other college men's basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: TaShawn Thomas scored 23 points, including two free throws with nine seconds left, and blocked a late layup by Shabazz Napier as host Houston defeated No. 17 Connecticut.

headline.main: UConn Falls Far Behind, Then Comes Up Short at Houston
headline.print_headline: UConn Falls Far Behind, Then Comes Up Short at Houston
